title: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST6B
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST6B model. This model consists of a PI voltage regulator with an inner loop field voltage regulator and pre-control. The field voltage regulator implements a proportional control. The pre-control and the delay in the feedback circuit increase the dynamic response.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 7.6.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcIEEEST6B

ilr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limit reference (I).  Typical Value = 4.164. Default: 0.0

kci.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limit adjustment (K).  Typical Value = 1.0577. Default: 0.0

kff.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pre-control gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K). Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kia.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 45.094. Default: 0.0

klr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter output current limiter gain (K).  Typical Value = 17.33. Default: 0.0

km.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forward gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kpa.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 18.038. Default: 0.0

oelin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. OEL input selector (OELin). Typical Value = noOELinput. Default: None

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback time constant of inner loop field voltage regulator (T). Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 4.81. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -3.85. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 4.81. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -3.85. Default: 0.0
